about_the_game:
Theodore Abescar was called to investigate a place called Hope and Dream Studio where a series of crimes took place, the main suspect, the owner of the studio called Frink Windler, is missing and now Theodore has to enter the place and find evidence that leads to Frink, but there is something inside waiting for Theodore.

About the game's gameplay: The game is in first person, your objective is to find all the evidence and return to the beginning of the level. Each of the 3 levels will be procedural depending on the 'seed' chosen, 'it is worth mentioning that you can change the seed' at each level a new character/NPC will be added that will hinder your main objective, for now there are only 4 characters but in future updates they will be new characters/NPCs added, some NPCs can kill you and end the game, be careful.

About procedural generation: Procedural generation works from a 'seed' that will determine each thing in the level.

About future updates: Even though the game is marked as "Released" it will still have more content, the game it was not in early access as the entire idea of ​​the game was already defined and little by little they will be added.

Why not add all the ideas at once?: me Adriano, the game developer, thought that adding everything at once wouldn't be cool to create mystery with the game's story.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains jumpscares, loud noises, flashing lights and gore.
